answers.answer: I think the answer is 8 times a day in a 24 hour period is the normal average.I think it also has to do with how much you drink though too.  If I'm drinking a lot of water (a liter an hour lets say) in the summer it is every 1/2 hour for me, and with a carbonation drink or alcohol it is much worse.If I'm just sitting around and not really drinking anything it might only be once every hour or two.  Though I'm a bad one to ask because I'm always running to the bathroom. LOLAlso I've heard a lot of woman who were pregnant say that they always fill like they have to urinate.There is a Urology Community on MH here that might be able to answer your question better.  Or maybe someone else will chime in on here for you.  I would let your doctor know about it though if it is a concern.

title: how much is frequent urination?
